reporting_cycle: Secretary-General reports prior to the expiration of the mandate
summary:
III. Tasks 

 Tasks shall include 
support to Haitian National Police 
restoration of public order 
protection of UN personnel 
promotion of human rights 

IV. Additional Tasks 

Additional tasks are 
support to transitional government 
organization of free and fair elections 
extension of state authority 

V. Reports 

The SG to provide reports on the implementation of the mandate 

VI. Financing 

 Calls on member states for substantial aid 

VII. Conclusion 

Decides to remain seized of the matter
